text: The Landowner's Daughter () is a 1953 Brazilian drama movie directed by Tom Payne and Oswaldo Sampaio and was based on the novel by Maria Camila Dezonne Pacheco Fernandes. It stars Anselmo Duarte, Eliane Lane, Ruth de Souza, Ricardo Campos. ==Other websites== * Category:1953 drama movies Category:Brazilian movies Category:Movies set in Brazil Category:Movies set in the 1880s Category:Movies about slavery Category:Movies based on books
title: The Landowner's Daughter
